name: Color Grid Colors
description:
A game where you have to color to form the pixel art, all in a relaxing atmosphere.

Controls:

[LEFT CLICK] - Paint Tile

[RIGHT CLICK AND HOLD] - Move around

[MOUSE WHEEL] - Zoom

[ESC] - Pause game

[H] - Show tutorial controls

[I] - Investigate for current color tiles (10 Seconds cooldown)

[G] - Fill Current color (Blocked)

[F] - Fill all (Blocked)

Thanks for playing!!!! :)))
